title: FRANKENSTEIN MEETS THE WOLF MAN 1943 colorized

sources.title: FRANKENSTEIN MEETS THE WOLF MAN 1943 colorized
sources.description: The resurrected Wolf Man, seeking a cure for his malady, enlists the aid of a mad scientist, who claims he will not only rid the Wolf Man of his nocturnal metamorphosis, but also revive the frozen body of Frankenstein's inhuman creation.
